author: Staff Reporter
text:
A mentally challenged man killed his mother, and younger brother at his residence in Nadupatti in Vazhapadi here on Wednesday.

Senthil (35) killed his mother Rajammal (55), and younger brother Rajasekar (33) in a fit of rage.

He was unhappy that he was not getting married.

His father Subramani died in harness as a postman, and mother Rajammal (55) got the job.

Though his brother was married, he was staying with them because of disputes with wife Saranya for the last three months.

Senthil used to pick up quarrel with them frequently.

On Wednesday he told a woman working at a farm land near his house that he had killed his mother, and brother.

She raised an alarm, and villagers gathered in strength in front of his house.

They found the bodies with throats slit, and informed the police. The police have admitted Senthil to a hospital.
title: Mentally challenged man kills mother, brother
